txt.en: Inspecting the Goods
A merchant has hurt his back and wants you to inspect them in his stead by smacking the bags.\n\nHis bags of rice can be found arrayed beyond the Wharf-gate just inside the Sail-haven.
A merchant has hurt his back and wants you to inspect them in his stead by smacking the bags.\n\nHis bags of rice can be found arrayed beyond the Wharf-gate just inside the Sail-haven.
Pick up the bag of bad rice
Smack the bags of rice (0/5)
A merchant has hurt his back and wants you to inspect them in his stead by smacking the bags.\n\nHis bags of rice can be found arrayed beyond the Wharf-gate just inside the Sail-haven.
A merchant has hurt his back and wants you to inspect them in his stead by smacking the bags.\n\nHis bags of rice can be found arrayed beyond the Wharf-gate just inside the Sail-haven.
Smack the bags of rice (3/5)
Smack the bags of rice (1/5)
You have found a bag of rice that does not pass muster. Pick it up and drop it next to the injured merchant.\n\nThe injured merchant can be found outside the Monger's Guild-hall in the Upper Ward.
Smack the bags of rice (4/5)
Smack the bags of rice (2/5)
You have inspected all the rice and should report back to the injured merchant.\n\nThe injured merchant is outside the Monger's Guild-hall in the Upper Ward of Umbar BaharbÃªl.
A merchant has hurt his back and wants you to inspect them in his stead by smacking the bags.\n\nHis bags of rice can be found arrayed beyond the Wharf-gate just inside the Sail-haven.
You have delivered the bag of bad rice
Talk to the injured merchant outside the Monger's Guild-hall
A quality bag of rice if ever you smacked one
No problems here, just delicious rice
<rgb=#FF0000>You dropped the bag of rice!</rgb>

'Ugh, I hurt my back recently, and now I cannot lift the sacks of rice I ordered. I need to check them in case I need to send any of them back to my supplier, but I can't easily move from this spot. Could you do it for me? No, you don't need to open the sacks. Just give them a whack. You'll know by the feel and the sound if the bag is good or not.\n\n'The sacks were unloaded by the Wharf-gate between the Sail-haven and the Upper Ward. There is an alley on the Sail-haven side of the gate where my men leave them. I need them to bring the sacks all the way here next time, if my back is not better, but I know they will not want to do that unless I pay them more... and that would be very difficult to do unless my fortunes change!'
A merchant needs help evaluating the quality of his goods.
Sounds good!
You hear good sound quality and feel the firmness of the bag
Carry the bag of rice and drop it next to the injured merchant outside the Monger's Guild-hall

'Oh good! So there was only the one bag that did not pass the smack test? Good. I will return it and ask that my coin be returned to me... when I am able to, of course. For now, I will sit here and enjoy the breeze.'
'Only one sack of bad rice so far? I hope the others are good.\n\n'You will return there to check the rest of them?'
Uh oh! That neither sounded nor felt right
